thread.title_full: Ground News - Obituary of a Member of Hizb ut Tahrir in a Chinese Prison

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Obituary of a Member of Hizb ut Tahrir in a Chinese Prison
text:
Summary by Ground News Syed Jahan Muhammad Khanovich Nodirov from Andijan, a member of Hizb ut Tahrir, was martyred in a Beijing prison. He was imprisoned by the Chinese government in the summer of 2000. His Uighur wife remains detained in a concentration camp, a place of repression and torture. Share menu More

The Khilafah Obituary of a Member of Hizb ut Tahrir in a Chinese Prison Another new crime has been added to the list of atrocities committed by the Chinese government, which is waging a fierce war against Islam and Muslims. The Chinese regime announced the death of Syed Jahan Muhammad Khanovich Nodirov from Andijan, a member of Hizb ut Tahrir, on November 28, 2023. Syed Jahan, who was martyred […]
